objects.text:
• Superior Reflective Technology
• Reduces Indoor Temperatures
• Weather-Resistant Formula

product_details.name: Panache MX Cool Top: Premium Reflective Roof Coating - Ultimate Heat Protection (20KG)
product_details.description:
• Professional-grade reflective roof coating for superior temperature control
• Large 20KG container for extensive coverage
• Contains specialized reflective and insulated minerals
• Helps reduce indoor temperatures and energy costs
• Easy application on roof surfaces
• Durable and weather-resistant formula
• Environmentally conscious cooling solution
• Premium quality from trusted brand Panache
• Ideal for commercial and residential buildings
• Long-lasting thermal protection performance

banner_details:
The banner features a clean, professional split layout with a dual-tone background. On the left, a vertical gradient from teal to deep green (#08A89C to #05776E) hosts the textual content and call-to-action. On the right, a subtle white to aqua background (#FFFFFF to #E8F8F7) highlights a large, realistic product image ("product_image") of a paint bucket. Circular, semi-transparent graphic elements add modern design flair to the green side.

The main promotional heading ("heading") is bold and white, followed by a light subheading ("subheading") in a soft aqua tone. Key features are listed in bullet points under "description". Pricing ("price") and packaging ("tagline") info are clearly displayed, followed by a white rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_background") with teal text ("cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Teal: #08A89C  
- Deep Teal: #05776E  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Aqua: #E8F8F7  
- CTA Text: #08A89C
product_color: The product image showcases a clean and modern design with a primary color palette that evokes coolness and reliability. The dominant color is a cool teal green (#007C7A), used boldly on the lower half of the container to signify cooling properties and draw attention. This is sharply contrasted with white (#FFFFFF), giving a crisp, hygienic feel. The brand name “Panache” includes a deep navy blue (#1A334D) which conveys trust and professionalism, while a touch of lime green (#A7C947) in the logo adds a refreshing and eco-friendly vibe. Colors are used to effectively highlight key product features while blending harmoniously.
